Name: RobsonROX
AboutMe:
I am an Senior Systems Analyst and Trainer, working as a consultant in Sao Paulo, Brazil, having beginned with programming 13yo, aspiring to build a game.

I work primarily with Microsoft technologies, mainly ASP.NET and SQL Server, with a deep understanding of HTML5 and AJAX (i've been using it when it was still called DHTML ans XHR was just another object). I'm also a Microsoft Certified Trainer.

I have a wonderful wife, two litte baby-boys, and besides just staying with them, my primary hobby is RPG.

Ah, by the way, i've already built some 10 games, but only educational ones, when i was working with distance learning.
